description: This file is a shell script used for managing OCI containers, including starting, stopping, listing, and executing commands within containers. It acts as a command-line tool for interacting with container instances via curl commands to a local service.
external_files: The script references JSON files in './DobbySpecs/' and tarballs in './TestBundles/' but does not directly include or import other external files.

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts a container from an OCI bundle located in the TestBundles directory or at a specified path, by sending a curl RPC request.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby specification JSON file in the DobbySpecs directory, by sending a curl RPC request.

methods.name: stop_container
methods.description: Stops a running container by sending a stop request via curl.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves information for a specified container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Fetches the current state of a specified container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command inside a specified container with optional options.

methods.name: ocicontainer_help
methods.description: Displays help information for the command-line tool.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main loop that reads user input commands and invokes corresponding functions.
